sociopatterns.imports.import_meta_data module¶

sociopatterns.imports.import_meta_data.import_meta(filename, sep, header, engine)¶

Import of the CSV-files

Imports the CSV-files as a Dataframe and renames the columns for a unified convention.

Parameters

  • filename (str)

  • sep (str)

  • header (int, list of int, default’infer’)

  • engine (str)

Returns

df – A DataFrame with three columns. Named as “Time”, “i”, “j”.

Return type

DataFrame

Notes

References
